snippet: The White House was locked down and a car was stopped by Secret Service agents after the driver followed Malia and Sasha Obama through a security checkpoint near the White House on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: The White House was locked down and a car was stopped by Secret Service agents after the driver followed Malia and Sasha Obama through a security checkpoint near the White House on Tuesday.

headline.main: Driver Detained After Following Obama Daughters’ Motorcade
headline.print_headline: Driver Is Held After Trailing Obama Motorcade
